## CharityORG.renameVolunteer() method

Rename a charity volunteer to a new unique name.

**Signature:**

```typescript
renameVolunteer(memberName: string, newName: string): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  memberName | string | Name of the volunteer to change. |
|  newName | string | New name for that volunteer. |

**Returns:**

boolean

True if successful, and false if not.

## Remarks

RAM cost: 0 GB

Rename a charity volunteer to the new name, if it's unique.
